title: Kentaro Suzuki
text:
is a former Japanese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Suzuki was born in <a href="Shibetsu%2C%20Hokkaido">Shibetsu</a> on June 2, 1980. After graduating from high school, he joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Shonan%20Bellmare">Bellmare Hiratsuka</a> (later "Shonan Bellmare") in 1999. However he could hardly play in the match and the club was relegated to <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> from 2000. In 2001, he moved to J2 club <a href="Montedio%20Yamagata">Montedio Yamagata</a>. He played as regular left side back in 2 seasons. In 2003, he moved to <a href="Tokyo%20Verdy">Tokyo Verdy</a>. Although he played as regular player from May, he could not play at all in the match from June. In July, he moved to J2 club <a href="Albirex%20Niigata">Albirex Niigata</a> and became a regular player as left side back. The club also won the champions in 2003 and was promoted to J1 from 2004. However his opportunity to play decreased from 2004. In 2007, he moved to <a href="Ventforet%20Kofu">Ventforet Kofu</a>. However he could hardly play in the match and retired end of 2007 season.
